name: Vulcano Eruption
description:
Vulcano Eruption

Self-evacuation from a volcanic disaster

                                                                                                                                                                                              

This game is an educational game about self-evacuation from a volcanic disaster.

This game is shown for cildren, teenagers, and adults with games that easy to understand.

This game was created using the RPG MAKER MV software and is currently under development.

Wait for the next update until the relase stage.

Stay tuned!

Developed by :

CAMWHYL & FRIEND'S
